about_the_game:
"Disappearance - Takeshi. You were right. That Abandoned Village is Too Bad" is a first-person horror-comedy game in which you search an abandoned Japanese village for your missing best friend.

Note: This game cannot be played in English. All languages in the game are Japanese.

Story

His best friend "Hikaru," who does not listen to him, ignores the advice of the protagonist "Takeshi" and heads for the cursed abandoned village of "Matsuzawa Village," where he goes missing.

Bizarre events attack Takeshi, who is assigned to search for Hikaru.

Can you survive in the face of an urban legend that seems quite serious?

Contents

The game is an "action adventure" in which you explore the field from a first-person perspective.

The objective of the game is to solve the mystery based on clues hidden in the abandoned village and find out the whereabouts of his best friend Hikaru.

Playing time: about 30 minutes
Number of endings: 1
